paper_abstract: It is shown that among all tight designs in FP(n) not equal RP(1), where F is R or C, or H (quaternions), only 5-designs in CP(1) (Lyubich, Shatalora Geom Dedicata 86: 169-178, 2001) have irrational angle set. This is the only case of equal ranks of the first and the last irreducible idempotent in the corresponding Bose-Mesner algebra.
